scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf examples/pages/**/*.vue && rimraf tests/**/coverage
scripts.build:utils: cross-env BABEL_ENV=utils babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/index.js
scripts.build:file: npm run build:icon & npm run build:entry & npm run build:i18n & node build/bin/version.js
scripts.build:theme: node build/bin/gen-cssfile && gulp build --gulpfile packages/theme-chalk/gulpfile.js && cp-cli packages/theme-chalk/lib lib/theme-chalk
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:file && vue-cli-service serve --mode production && echo varfe.gitee.io/vary>>examples/vary-ui/CNAME
scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && npm run build:file && npm run serve && npm run build:template
scripts.dev:play: npm run build:file && npm run serve
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run lint && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:common && npm run build:components && npm run build:utils && npm run build:umd && npm run build:theme
scripts.pub: npm run bootstrap && sh build/git-release.sh && sh build/release.sh && node build/bin/gen-indices.js && sh build/deploy.sh
scripts.pub2: npm run bootstrap && sh build/git-release.sh && sh build/release2.sh && node build/bin/gen-indices.js && sh build/deploy.sh
